item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: stunning, bendy, and spendy
item.description: I’ve been using the Galaxy Z Fold 7 for a week, and I’ve run out of ways to say “It’s so nice.” It’s not essential, or life-changing; it’s nice. It’s an understatement, though. Samsung joins the likes
